mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_energy_equip tee LEFT JOIN t_energy_equip_verify teev ON tee.id=teev.equip_id AND teev.is_active=1 AND teev.enable_flag=1 LEFT JOIN t_hvac_node thn ON tee.node_id=thn.id AND thn.is_active=1 WHERE tee.is_active=1 AND tee.id=#{id}
